original_title: Captain Power and the Soldiers of the Future: Bio Dreas Strike Mission - Skill Level 2
overview: THIS IS IT! YOUR FIRST PLANNED MISSION AGAINST THE BIO DREAD EMPIRE! Your target is a massive Bio Dread military industrial complex - which is manufacturing a robotic army. Many human survivors are depending on you! Corporal Jennifer "PILOT" Chase and Captain Jonathan Power will be flying with you. Prepare to "POWER ON"!
title: Captain Power and the Soldiers of the Future: Bio Dreas Strike Mission - Skill Level 2
